description:
Foreigners

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12521 Statistics of foreigners

Definition:
All persons who are not Germans as defined in Article 116
(1) of the Basic Law, i.e. who do not have the German
citizenship. They include stateless persons and those with
uncertain citizenship. Germans who also have a foreign
citizenship are not counted as foreigners.
Members of the foreign armed forces stationed in Germany and
of foreign diplomatic missions and consular posts in the
Federal Republic of Germany and their family members are not
subject to the provisions of the Foreigners Act and are not
covered by statistics. Outside population statistics,
members of the foreign armed forces stationed in Germany and
their family members are partly covered by statistics.

The data on the number of foreigners for 2004 and later
according to the Central Register of Foreigners are not
directly comparable with those of the previous years because
the register was adjusted in 2004.
